FLAIR
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which FLAIR installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using FLAIR, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load FLAIR/1.5.1-20200630-foss-2019b-Python-3.7.4
```
